summary: Your voice is now Chuck Norris blasting anything and everything that stands in your path to oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
** This is a FUN Mod **

Remember that first time you walked into a giant and then being blasted to oblivion? Well, you are the Dragonborn and this mod lets you do just that.

This mod replaces your vocal chords with that of Chuck Norris\' when performing the Unrelenting Force. You can check the effect in the video preview below.

[YOUTUBE]Q2YGE4gt734[/YOUTUBE]

Other Changes in the Mod:
- The Projectiles have been changed for Fus and Ro to blast enemies to glory rather just stagger them.
- The cooldown of the Unrelenting Force spells have been lowered to 7/14/21 seconds repesctively.
author: wykrhm
